articles.title: Stock Market Today: Top 10 things to know before the market opens today - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Stock Market News: Trends in the SGX Nifty indicate a positive opening for the broader index in India with a gain of 66 points on Wednesday, supported by positive cues from the Wall Street and Asian markets
articles.content:
The market is expected to open in the green as trends in the SGX Nifty indicate a positive opening for the broader index in India with a gain of 66 points.

articles.title: Deciphering colorectal cancer genetics through multi-omic analysis of 100204 cases and 154587 controls of European and east Asian ancestries - Nature.com
articles.description: A multi-ancestry genome-wide association study meta-analysis, combined with transcriptome- and methylome-wide association analyses, identifies risk loci associated with colorectal cancer. Credible effector genes and their target tissues are also highlighted, …
